cocktails.name: Absinthe
cocktails.instructions: Using an absinthe spoon if available, slowly drip very cold clear water into the absinthe. The absinthe should turn slightly opaque as the cold water is added. After the water has been added, stir in the cube of sugar, and add ice if you like. Absinthe can also be had without the sugar

cocktails.name: Agaurdiente
cocktails.instructions: Literally translated as 'firewater', this liquor is best enjoyed as a shot

cocktails.name: Americano
cocktails.instructions: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into a glass. Add a splash of Soda Water and garnish with half an orange slice (Wikipedia)

cocktails.name: Anisette
cocktails.instructions: Drink slowly neat, or mixed with water for a less strong drink

cocktails.name: Brandy and Soda
cocktails.instructions: Pour the Brandy into a large glass. Add ice and top off with soda water. Hemingway preferred Perrier

cocktails.name: Bailey
cocktails.instructions: Tear up the mint first and put it in the shaker, adding the gin soon after. After letting the gin sit for a bit, add the grapefruit and lime juices. Stir with ice and garnish with a sprig of mint

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.instructions: Add the Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, and salt and pepper to a large glass, then pour in the liquid ingredients with ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge and/or a celery stalk

cocktails.name: Cayo Hueso la Floridita
cocktails.instructions: Mix the ingredients in a large glass with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge

cocktails.name: Champagne Cocktail
cocktails.instructions: Add the bitters over the sugar cube in a champagne flute. Then, add the cognac and  chilled champagne. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry

cocktails.name: Cuba Libre
cocktails.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Garish with a lime wedge

cocktails.name: Daquiri Papa Doble
cocktails.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker, shake with ice and serve in a martini glass. Garnish with a lime wedge

cocktails.name: Death in the afternoon
cocktails.instructions: Hemingway said it best. 'Pour one jigger absinthe into a Champagne glass. Add iced Champagne until it attains the proper opalescent milkiness. Drink three to five of these slowly'

cocktails.name: Death in the Gulfstream
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with ice

cocktails.name: Farewell to Hemingway
cocktails.instructions: Shake the kirsch, lime juice, and syrup with ice, pour into a collins glass with ice cubes. Top with club soda. Garnish with a large lime peel.

cocktails.name: Gimlet
cocktails.instructions: Mix and serve, garnish with a slice of lime

cocktails.name: Gin and Tonic
cocktails.instructions: Mix in a glass with ice, garnish with whatever you want

cocktails.name: Gluhwein
cocktails.instructions: Heat the wine with the spices. Drink warm in a mug and garnish with an orange slice

cocktails.name: Green Isaac's Specia
cocktails.instructions: Shake with ice and pour unstrained into a tall glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime.
cocktails.book: The book that best goes with the drink

cocktails.name: Jack Rose
cocktails.instructions: Shake and pour into a chilled glass. Garnish with a cherry and slice of apple. Serve

cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a glass. Garnish with an olice

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.instructions: Muddle mint sprigs with lime juice and sugar in a Collins glass. Add rum, ice, and top with soda water. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.instructions: Stir into a glass over ice. Garnish with an orange peel.
cocktails.book: Across the River and Into the Trees

cocktails.name: Pauline Hemingway's Rum Scoundrel
cocktails.instructions: Add to a shaker with ice, and shake '75 times'. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Pernod Cocktail
cocktails.instructions: Mix the ingredients til the sugar dissolves, then add ice.

cocktails.name: Pink Gin
cocktails.instructions: Coat a chilled cocktail glass with bitters, then fill with chilled gin. Garnish with a slice of lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Rum Swizzle
cocktails.instructions: Shake in a pitcher with crushed ice. Strain into glasses and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry. Serves 6

cocktails.name: Scotch and Lime Juice
cocktails.instructions: Mix in an old fashioned glass with ice.

cocktails.name: Vermouth Panache
cocktails.instructions: Add to a glass with ice, stir and serve
cocktails.book: Across the River and Into the Trees

cocktails.name: Villa America Special
cocktails.instructions: Coat the rim of a chilled glass with sugar and lemon juice. Shake the ingredients with ice then strain into a glass.
cocktails.book: Across the River and Into the Trees

cocktails.name: Whiskey and Ginger Ale
cocktails.instructions: Fill Highball glass with ice. Add whiskey and top with ginger ale.

cocktails.name: Scotch and Soda
cocktails.instructions: Put some ice in a highball glass. Add the scotch then the soda, and stir.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

cocktails.name: White Lady
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a martini glass.
